languages.text: "Готик, на котором мы говорим внутри культа, немного отличается от того, что звучит на верхних палубах. "Домин" означает "податель{mf||ница} жизни". "Цар{mf|ь|ица} ковчега". "Солнце, не отбрасывающее теней". Это титул, который Мать-паучиха дала Вольному Торговцу, позволившему ей основать культ Кровавой паутины. Мы используем и другие. Например, "Вени" значит "повелевающий {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Имматериумом{/g}" или "страж вуали". "Вил" — "тот, кому пора отправиться по другую сторону". "Амик" — "тот, на кого можно положиться в бою".

"The Gothic we use to communicate is different to that spoken on the upper decks. 'Domin' has many meanings: 'Giver of Life,' 'Lord or Lady of the Ark,' and 'Shadowless Sun.' The Matriarch Spider gave this title to the Rogue Trader who allowed her to form the Bloodspun Web. We use other titles as well. For example, 'Veni' means 'master of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g}' or 'watcher of the veil.' 'Vil' means 'one who must go to the other side.' 'Amic' means 'one you can trust in battle.'"
languages.original_text: "Готик, на котором мы говорим внутри культа, немного отличается от того, что звучит на верхних палубах. "Домин" означает "податель{mf||ница} жизни". "Цар{mf|ь|ица} ковчега". "Амик" — "тот, на кого можно положиться в бою".

traits.locale_text: "The Gothic we use to communicate is different to that spoken on the upper decks. 'Enim' means 'Giver of Life.' 'Lord or Lady of the Ark.' 'Shadowless Sun.' The Founder of the Weave gave this title to the Rogue Trader who let her form the Bloodspun Web. We use other titles as well. For example, 'Oa' means 'master of the Immaterium' or 'watcher of the veil.' 'Tei' means 'one who must go to the other side.' 'Mei' means 'one you can trust in battle.'"

'Amic' means 'one you can trust in battle.'"

languages.text: «La lengua gótica que usamos para comunicarnos es distinta a la que se habla en las cubiertas superiores. "Domin" tiene muchos significados: "quien otorga vida", "señor o señora del arca" y "sol sin sombra". La Araña Matriarca otorgó este título al comerciante Independiente que le permitió formar la Red Sanguinolenta. También utilizamos otros títulos. Por ejemplo, "Veni" significa "señor o señora del {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}inmaterio{/g}" o "vigilante del velo". "Vil" significa "alguien que debe ir al otro lado". "Amic" significa "alguien en quien puedes confiar en combate"».
languages.original_text: "The Gothic we use to communicate is different to that spoken on the upper decks. 'Domin' has many meanings: 'Giver of Life,' 'Lord or Lady of the Ark,' and 'Shadowless Sun.' The Matriarch Spider gave this title to the Rogue Trader who allowed her to form the Bloodspun Web. We use other titles as well. For example, 'Veni' means 'master of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g}' or 'watcher of the veil.' 'Vil' means 'one who must go to the other side.' 'Amic' means 'one you can trust in battle.'"

"Amic" significa "alguien en quien puedes confiar en combate"».

languages.text: 「私たちがコミュニケーションに使っているゴシック語は、上層デッキで使われているものとは違う。『ドミン』にはさまざまな意味がある。『生命の贈り主』、『箱舟の主人・女主人』、『影のない太陽』、『蜘蛛の師母』。織り手の創設者はこの称号を、彼女にブラッドスパン・ウェブの結成を許可した自由開拓者に与えた。私たちは他の称号も使う。例えば『ヴェニ』は、『{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}非物質世界{/g}のマスター』や『ヴェールの番人』を意味する。『ヴィル』は『あちら側に行くべき者』。『アミック』は、『戦いで信頼できる者』を意味する」
languages.original_text: "The Gothic we use to communicate is different to that spoken on the upper decks. 'Domin' has many meanings: 'Giver of Life,' 'Lord or Lady of the Ark,' and 'Shadowless Sun.' The Matriarch Spider gave this title to the Rogue Trader who allowed her to form the Bloodspun Web. We use other titles as well. For example, 'Veni' means 'master of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g}' or 'watcher of the veil.' 'Vil' means 'one who must go to the other side.' 'Amic' means 'one you can trust in battle.'"

traits.locale_text: 「私たちがコミュニケーションに使っているゴシック語は、上層デッキで使われているものとは違う。『ドミン』にはさまざまな意味がある。『生命の贈り主』、『箱舟の主人・女主人』、『影のない太陽』、『蜘蛛の師母』。織り手の創設者はこの称号を、彼女にブラッドスパン・ウェブの結成を許可した自由開拓者に与えた。私たちは他の称号も使う。例えば『ヴェニ』は、『{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}非物質世界{/g}のマスター』や『ヴェールの番人』を意味する。『ヴィル』は『あちら側に行くべき者』。『アミック』は、『戦いで信頼できる者』を意味する」

languages.text: “我们用来交流的哥特语，与上层甲板的常用的哥特语截然不同。‘秘者’这个词有许多含义，其中包括‘赐命者’、‘方舟之主’、‘无影烈阳’。织血罗网的创始人将这个头衔赠与了允许她开创教派的行商浪人。除此之外，我们也会有其他头衔来称呼别人。例如，‘帷者’的意思是‘{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}亚空间{/g}的主人’或‘面纱的守望者’，‘敌者’的意思是‘必须送到彼岸的人’，而‘信者’的意思是‘在战场上可以信赖的人’。
languages.original_text: "The Gothic we use to communicate is different to that spoken on the upper decks. 'Domin' has many meanings: 'Giver of Life,' 'Lord or Lady of the Ark,' and 'Shadowless Sun.' The Matriarch Spider gave this title to the Rogue Trader who allowed her to form the Bloodspun Web. We use other titles as well. For example, 'Veni' means 'master of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g}' or 'watcher of the veil.' 'Vil' means 'one who must go to the other side.' 'Amic' means 'one you can trust in battle.'"

traits.locale_text: “我们用来交流的哥特语，与上层甲板的常用的哥特语截然不同。‘秘者’这个词有许多含义，其中包括‘赐命者’、‘方舟之主’、‘无影烈阳’。织血罗网的创始人将这个头衔赠与了允许她开创教派的行商浪人。除此之外，我们也会有其他头衔来称呼别人。例如，‘帷者’的意思是‘亚空间的主人’或‘面纱的守望者’，‘敌者’的意思是‘必须送到彼岸的人’，而‘信者’的意思是‘在战场上可以信赖的人’。

languages.text: "Das Gotisch, mit dem wir kommunizieren, unterscheidet sich von dem, das auf den oberen Decks gesprochen wird. 'Domin' hat viele Bedeutungen: 'Lebensspender', 'Lord oder Lady der Arche und ''Schattenlose Sonne'. Die Matriarchenspinne verlieh diesen Titel dem Freihändler, der ihr erlaubte, das Blutgesponnene Netz zu formen. Wir benutzen auch noch andere Titel. 'Veni' bedeutet zum Beispiel 'Meister des {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immateriums{/g}' oder 'Wächter des Schleiers'. 'Tei' bedeutet 'Person, die auf die andere Seite gehen muss'. 'Amic' bedeutet 'Person, der du in der Schlacht vertrauen kannst'."
languages.original_text: "The Gothic we use to communicate is different to that spoken on the upper decks. 'Domin' has many meanings: 'Giver of Life,' 'Lord or Lady of the Ark,' and 'Shadowless Sun.' The Matriarch Spider gave this title to the Rogue Trader who allowed her to form the Bloodspun Web. We use other titles as well. For example, 'Veni' means 'master of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g}' or 'watcher of the veil.' 'Vil' means 'one who must go to the other side.' 'Amic' means 'one you can trust in battle.'"

'Amic' bedeutet 'Person, der du in der Schlacht vertrauen kannst'."

languages.text: « Le gothique dont nous nous servons pour communiquer est différent de la langue en usage sur les ponts supérieurs. Le mot "Domin" a de nombreuses significations : "Source de vie", "Seigneur ou Maîtresse de l'Arche" et "Soleil sans Ombre". L'araignée matriarche a donné ce titre au libre-marchand qui l'a autorisée à instituer la Toile de Sang, et ce n'est pas le seul que nous utilisions. Par exemple, "Veni" signifie "maître de l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g}" ou "observateur du voile", "Vil" désigne un individu appelé à passer de l'autre côté et "Amic" un allié sur lequel on peut compter au combat. »
languages.original_text: "The Gothic we use to communicate is different to that spoken on the upper decks. 'Domin' has many meanings: 'Giver of Life,' 'Lord or Lady of the Ark,' and 'Shadowless Sun.' The Matriarch Spider gave this title to the Rogue Trader who allowed her to form the Bloodspun Web. We use other titles as well. For example, 'Veni' means 'master of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g}' or 'watcher of the veil.' 'Vil' means 'one who must go to the other side.' 'Amic' means 'one you can trust in battle.'"

For example, 'Veni' means 'master of the Immaterium' or 'watcher of the veil.' 'Vil' means 'one who must go to the other side.' 'Amic' means 'one you can trust in battle.'"

languages.text: "Konuştuğumuz Gotik, üst güvertelerde konuşulandan farklıdır. 'Domin' pek çok farklı anlam barındırır: 'Can Bahşeden', 'Arkın Lordu veya Leydisi' ve 'Gölgesiz Güneş'. Örümcek Kraliçe, bu ünvanı Kanipi Ağı'nı kurmasına müsaade eden Hür Tacir'e vermişti. Kullandığımız başka ünvanlar da var. Mesela 'Veni', '{g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Tindiyar'ın{/g} efendisi' veya 'örtünün bekçisi' anlamına gelir. 'Vil', 'öteki tarafı boylaması gereken kişi' demektir. 'Amik', 'savaşta güvenebileceğin kişi' anlamında kullanılır."
languages.original_text: "The Gothic we use to communicate is different to that spoken on the upper decks. 'Domin' has many meanings: 'Giver of Life,' 'Lord or Lady of the Ark,' and 'Shadowless Sun.' The Matriarch Spider gave this title to the Rogue Trader who allowed her to form the Bloodspun Web. We use other titles as well. For example, 'Veni' means 'master of the {g|Encyclopedia:WarpGlossary}Immaterium{/g}' or 'watcher of the veil.' 'Vil' means 'one who must go to the other side.' 'Amic' means 'one you can trust in battle.'"
